channel.title: Need help with making a pk box!
channel.description:
Ok, so i am new to making private servers. I would like to add a pk box, where you loose all your stuff.
I need to know what to search for and where (ex. client.java search for isInWilderness)
The coordinates i would like to make the pk box at is: southwest coords- 2138(x) 5095(y) northeast coords- 2164(x) 5103(y)
Thanks everyone! ;)

item.title: Need help with making a pk box!
item.dc:creator: @mod_fr0z3n mod fr0z3n
item.description:
@mod_fr0z3n wrote:

still need help guys!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 03:48:11 pm[/size][hr][quote=“noobspure50, post:8, topic:318451”][quote author=mod fr0z3n link=topic=414911.msg3054286#msg3054286 date=1260327453]
ehh well thanks anyway.
[/quote]
|| (absX >= 2138 && absX <= 2164 && absY >= 5095 && absY <= 5103)
try adding those to public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
If you have it it should work[/quote]

Thanks but im getting an error!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 04:28:30 pm[/size][hr]FIXED thanks everyone so much!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making a pk box!
item.dc:creator: @skaterb0y12 skaterb0y12
item.description:
@skaterb0y12 wrote:

client.java search for “public boolean nonwild”

paste this under it

|| (absX >= 2138 && absX <= 2164 && absY >= 5095 && absY <= 5103)

in here anywhere you see these just post it like this…

public boolean nonWild() {
        if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)
                || (absX >= 2439 && absX <= 2448 && absY >= 4951 && absY <= 4960)
                || (absX >= 2447 && absX <= 2457 && absY >= 4933 && absY <= 4944)
                || (absX >= 2467 && absX <= 2480 && absY >= 4933 && absY <= 4945)
                || (absX >= 2138 && absX <= 2164 && absY >= 5095 && absY <= 5103) <---right here see

hope this helped!

Read full topic
